step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms straight and fingers open as you begin to stretch overhead.
Nice job stretching your arms overhead. Remember to keep your fingers spread wide.
Great fist and squeeze! Focus on bringing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Remember to inhale.
Well done stretching back overhead. Ensure you are exhaling and fully relaxing your muscles.
Excellent completion of the first repetition. You're doing great!
Good job on the second rep's start. Keep those arms straight and fingers open as you reach up.
You're doing well stretching overhead. Keep those fingers spread wide for maximum benefit.
Excellent fist and squeeze! Focus on bringing your shoulder blades together and inhaling deeply.
Great job reaching overhead. Remember to exhale fully and relax your muscles completely.
Fantastic! You've completed both repetitions with good form. Keep up the great work!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers spread wide when stretching overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together when making a fist. Continue practicing these movements to build strength and promote lymph drainage.
